short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension finds the most overused pandemic-related terms and swaps them out with more fitting ones.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Pandemic Word Swapper changes "pivot" to "oofle doofle", "unprecedented" to "toe up from the floe up", "new normal" to "gaa-bage", "uncertain times" to "a bunch of dookie" and "essential workers" to "the overworked and under-appreciated". Developed with love by Imagine.
